deep-discipline-expertise.description: Specialism. The vertical part of the T

cross-discipline-expertise.description: The horizontal part of the T

personal-effectiveness.description: Tools and patterns that you use within your job role but which don't necessarily fall under your main job role but contribute to your effectiveness within the organisation.

everything-else.description: Taking a holistic approach to personal development and allowing folks to put more personal goals/tools/practices in here.
